subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The New York State Gaming Commission will investigate a complaint that Luis Saez, who rode the Travers winner Will Take Charge, used an electrical device on his horse during the race.
snippet: The New York State Gaming Commission will investigate a complaint that Luis Saez, who rode the Travers winner Will Take Charge, used an electrical device on his horse during the race.
